About the Company: Fine-Line Circuits Ltd manufacture electronic components. They manufacture printed circuit boards, like, rigid glass epoxy multi layer and double side, rigid CEM, rigid flex, backplane, impedance controlled, metallic heatsink and bind and buries via printed circuit boards.The company`s product range includes Multi Layer PCBs,Impedance Controlled PCBs,Backplane PCBs ,Single & Double Sided PCBs,etc
